file.name: schema.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
 - url: https://{environment}.osis.uclouvain.be/api/v1/program_management/
   variables:
     environment:
       default: dev
       enum:
         - dev # Development server
         - qa # Staging server
         - test # Test server
 - url: https://osis.uclouvain.be/api/v1/program_management/
   description: Production server
info:
  version: '1.03'
  title: Program Management Service
  description: |-
    A set of API endpoints that allow you to get, update, delete an education group.
paths:
  /trainings/{year}/{acronym}/{version_name}/prerequisites:
    get:
      description: Return the prerequisites of the learning units of the training version
      operationId: training_prerequisites_version
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: version_name
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArrayOfProgramTreePrerequisites'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - trainings
  /trainings/{year}/{acronym}/{version_name}/transition/prerequisites:
    get:
      description: Return the prerequisites of the learning units of the training version (transition)
      operationId: training_prerequisites_version_transition
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: version_name
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArrayOfProgramTreePrerequisites'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - trainings
  /trainings/{year}/{acronym}/prerequisites:
    get:
      description: Return the prerequisites of the learning units of the training (standard version)
      operationId: training_prerequisites_official
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArrayOfProgramTreePrerequisites'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - trainings
  /trainings/{year}/{acronym}/transition/prerequisites:
    get:
      description: Return the prerequisites of the learning units of the training (standard version transition)
      operationId: training_prerequisites_transition
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArrayOfProgramTreePrerequisites'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - trainings
  /mini_trainings/{year}/{acronym}/{version_name}/prerequisites:
    get:
      description: Return the prerequisites of the learning units of the mini-training version
      operationId: mini-training_prerequisites_version
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: version_name
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArrayOfProgramTreePrerequisites'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - mini_trainings
  /mini_trainings/{year}/{acronym}/{version_name}/transition/prerequisites:
    get:
      description: Return the prerequisites of the learning units of the mini-training version transition
      operationId: mini-training_prerequisites_version_transition
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: version_name
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArrayOfProgramTreePrerequisites'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - mini_trainings
  /mini_trainings/{year}/{acronym}/prerequisites:
    get:
      description: Return the prerequisites of the learning units of the mini-training (standard version)
      operationId: mini-training_prerequisites_official
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArrayOfProgramTreePrerequisites'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - mini_trainings
  /mini_trainings/{year}/{acronym}/transition/prerequisites:
    get:
      description: Return the prerequisites of the learning units of the mini-training (standard version transition)
      operationId: mini-training_prerequisites_transition
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArrayOfProgramTreePrerequisites'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - mini_trainings
components:
  securitySchemes:
    Token:
      type: apiKey
      in: header
      name: Authorization
      description: Enter your token in the format **Token <token>**
  parameters:
    X-User-FirstName:
      in: header
      name: X-User-FirstName
      schema:
        type: string
      required: false
    X-User-LastName:
      in: header
      name: X-User-LastName
      schema:
        type: string
      required: false
    X-User-Email:
      in: header
      name: X-User-Email
      schema:
        type: string
      required: false
    X-User-GlobalID:
      in: header
      name: X-User-GlobalID
      schema:
        type: string
      required: false
    Accept-Language:
      in: header
      name: Accept-Language
      description: >
        The header advertises which languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred. (By languages, we mean natural languages, such as English, and not programming languages.)
      schema:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/AcceptedLanguageEnum'
      required: false
  responses:
    Unauthorized:
      description: Unauthorized
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
    BadRequest:
      description: Bad request
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
    NotFound:
      description: The specified resource was not found
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
  schemas:
    ArrayOfProgramTreePrerequisites:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProgramTreePrerequisites'
    ProgramTreePrerequisites:
      type: object
      properties:
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
        code:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        title_en:
          type: string
        prerequisites_string:
          type: string
          example: (codeA OR codeB) AND (codeC)
        prerequisites:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/NodeBase'
    NodeBase:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
        title:
          type: string
        title_en:
          type: string
    AcceptedLanguageEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'en'
        - 'fr-be'
    Error:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
      required:
        - code
        - message
security:
  - Token: []
